abilities.description: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 6 seconds.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance.
7 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Mage Slayer
description: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.
tips: Generally used against spell based heroes or lineups when playing as a hero reliant on auto-attacks or one that uses skills that use attack modifiers.
